# tf.keras.backend.elu

``` python
elu(
    x,
    alpha=1.0
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/backend.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/keras/_impl/keras/backend.py).

Exponential linear unit.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`x`</b>: A tensor or variable to compute the activation function for.
* <b>`alpha`</b>: A scalar, slope of positive section.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
